name: acid
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.
